name: Subway Surfers Dark Pou
description:
Jake from Subway Surfers, runs into a dangerous mysterious being called Dark Pou. Time to stop running and take up a gun and shoot that brown thing to dust!

WASD  - Movement
SHIFT - Sprint
CTRL - Crouch
SPACE - Jump
F - Purchase Hoverboard
Left Click - Shoot

Confused? Watch the whole saga unfolds on https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLlRfGO-3H76l4UD8le-p7aqtA0Ohz30pR

The game is not stable, there maybe some bugs you'll encounter and if you do... Goodluck! :D
